title: Why do people want the tank meta back?

embed.description: A large number of tanks are either absolute trash or just barely passing okay. The "tank update" a while back only served to decimate the...

body:
Here is just one thread on the matter, but I keep seeing this complaint in Discord as well as Gameplay.

The tank meta was slow, boring, and took far less skill. Main goal was to get so tanky you couldn't kill anyone so basically, fights devolved into very slow drag-out brawls. Current meta VERY high skill. You can't make a mistake or else you die. High risk high reward. 

Micro is high skill. Micro is like the corner stone of an RTS. Cinderhulk very low micro. Champs who were best were brainlet champs (Shyvana/Mundo/Sej)
